name: Prana Zandra Funnel Neck Top - Women's
description:
A smart, comfortable choice for chilly morning runs or a relaxing cool down stretch.Quick-drying stretch jersey hash a soft peached finish.Extra long cuffs with thumb holes to keep your sleeves in place.Funnel neck with a tuck detail at the back.Standard fit feels right from day one.

        Sustainability
